to AMA - Anti Mobile Addiction App. 
By using this app, you agree to the following terms and conditions: 

 Acceptance of Terms

 By downloading and using the AMA App, you agree to abide by the terms and conditions set forth in this document. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the app. 

 Use of the App
 You are granted a non-transferable, non-exclusive license to use the app for personal use only. You agree to not misuse or exploit the app for any illegal, harmful, or unauthorized purposes. 

 Privacy and Data Collection
 AMA may collect personal information, such as usage data and statistics, to improve the app's functionality. Please review our Privacy Policy for more details on how we handle your data. 

 Limitation of Liability
 AMA will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the app. You use the app at your own risk. 

 Termination of Use
 We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the app at any time without notice for violations of these terms and conditions. 

 Modifications
 AMA reserves the right to modify, update, or discontinue the app at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to stay informed about any changes. 

 Governing Law
 These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Philippines. Any disputes will be resolved in the appropriate courts of the Philippines. 

 Contact Us
 If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at AMA@gmail.com."
